snippet: First baseman Mark Teixeira said his wrist injury was not a sprain but rather a partially torn tendon sheath, which might keep him out until June, and maybe longer.
abstract: First baseman Mark Teixeira said his wrist injury was not a sprain but rather a partially torn tendon sheath, which might keep him out until June, and maybe longer.

headline.main: Teixeira Expected to Be Out Longer With Partly Torn Tendon Sheath
headline.print_headline: Teixeira to Be Sidelined Longer Than Expected
